titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the two Houses until November 30, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 210 - 181 (Record Vote No: 447).

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/20/1987--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives and of the Senate from November 20, 23, or 24, 1987, until November 30, 1987.
